EDUCATION.Institute Name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Hyderabad

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: A backend server that can act as an Online Judge. Built using Spring Boot along with using Spring Data as the Database connection.

This project uses python to implement three types of translation systems: IBM Model 1 using EM algorithm. IBM Model 2 Phrase based Translation. Both scratch implementation of these models and the default nltk library are used, and they are compared for the given dataset.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: AI for Mass Rapid Transport Systems
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: A rerouting and rescheduling AI for Subways or any Mass Rapid Transport Systems.
A discrete event simulator which simulates an Operating system scheduling processes in preemptive First Come First Serve (FCFS), or in Round Robin Queue (RR).

The project uses the Vector Space model or tf-idf to generate a score for each document, and accordingly pass it through a checker which returns uniqueness of each document and assigns a plagiarism level, based on the number of matching sentences and words. Preference is given to sentences.

This project implements 3 primary types of recommender system techniques: Collaborative filtering, SVD and CUR matrix decomposition. Each one additionally also implements the global baseline technique. The systems are evaluated using RMSE, precision on top K, and Spearman ranking.
